about_the_game:
Embark on a spine-chilling journey in this unique deck-builder that seamlessly blends roguelike exploration, isometric grid traversal, and innovative card crafting into a turn-based puzzle strategy game. Assume the role of a young boy trapped in a haunted house, desperately seeking an escape. Will you navigate the eerie corridors, unravel the mysteries, and emerge unscathed?

🃏 Innovative Card Crafting System

Unlike traditional deck-building games, Scarred Mansion introduces a groundbreaking card crafting system. Rather than adding or removing cards from your deck, you have a fixed set of cards which can be customized using your inventory of different components. Unlock additional card slots and enhance their potency to create a powerful customized deck!

🔮 Dynamic Encounters and Puzzles

Encounter a myriad of supernatural entities, solve intricate puzzles, and confront menacing foes. Adapt your strategy on the fly as you face varied and unexpected challenges, ensuring every playthrough is a thrilling and unpredictable experience. Explore the haunted house's hidden corners to discover mysterious secrets and unlock powerful new components to use. These add depth to your gameplay, offering new ways to approach challenges and altering the course of your haunting adventure.

👁️ Visually Stunning Atmosphere

Immerse yourself in the hauntingly beautiful visuals of the environment. Every shadow, every flickering candle, and every spectral entity contributes to an atmospheric experience that will send shivers down your spine. Complementing the chilling visuals is an original soundtrack that enhances the eerie ambiance of Scarred Mansion. The haunting melodies and atmospheric sounds intensify the sense of foreboding, creating an unforgettable auditory experience.

Venture into the unknown, craft your fate, and escape the clutches of the supernatural in Scarred Mansion. Do you have the courage to face the darkness and uncover the mysteries within? Your haunted adventure awaits on the other side of the door.
